name: lfw-data
description: Serverless (AWS Lambda) project for LFW data processing

scripts.integration-test: lab test/integration -v -r console -o stdout -r junit -o test/output-integration.xml -m 30000
scripts.unit-test: lab test/unit -c -r console -o stdout -r lcov -o lcov.info -r junit -o test/output-unit.xml
scripts.pre-deployment-test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test

author: DEFRA
